item.title: Melody add a quote by Neal Maxwell
item.description: "The spirit can drive the flesh beyond where it first agrees to go." Neal Maxwell" -- Neal Maxwell

item.title: Melody add a quote by Karen Lamb
item.description: "A year from now you may wish you had started today." -- Karen Lamb

item.title: Melody add a quote by Paul Graham
item.description: "Being strong-willed is not enough, however. You also have to be hard on yourself. Someone who was strong-willed but self-indulgent would not be called determined. Determination implies your willfulness is balanced by discipline." -- Paul Graham

item.title: Melody add a quote by Criss Jami
item.description: "The barrier during self-improvement is not so much that we hate learning, rather we hate being taught. To learn entails that the knowledge was achieved on one's own accord - it feels great - but to be taught often leaves a feeling of inferiority. Thus it takes a bit of determination and a lot of humility in order for one to fully develop." -- Criss Jami

item.title: Melody add a quote by Beverly Sills
item.description: "There are no shortcuts to any place worth going." -- Beverly Sills

item.title: Melody add a quote by Claire Cook
item.description: "If plan A doesn't work, the alphabet has 25 more letters - 204 if you're in Japan." -- Claire Cook

item.title: Melody add a quote by Bill Wilson
item.description: "Indecision with the passing of time becomes decision." -- Bill Wilson

item.title: Melody add a quote by T.F. Hodge
item.description: "To conquer frustration, one must remain intensely focused on the outcome, not the obstacles." -- T.F. Hodge

item.title: Melody add a quote by Author-Poet Aberjhani
item.description: "The death of a dream can in fact serve as the vehicle that endows it with new form, with reinvigorated substance, a fresh flow of ideas, and splendidly revitalized color. In short, the power of a certain kind of dream is such that death need not indicate finality at all but rather signify a metaphysical and metaphorical leap forward." -- Author-Poet Aberjhani

item.title: Melody add a quote by T.F. Hodge
item.description: "If you have a dream, keep it. But write it down and take appropriate actions to see it manifest." -- T.F. Hodge

item.title: Melody add a quote by Richelle E. Goodrich
item.description: "What you perceive as a failure today may actually be a crucial step towards the success you seek. Never give up." -- Richelle E. Goodrich

item.title: Melody add a quote by Dr Roopleen
item.description: "To turn your dreams into reality, all your resources, efforts and concentration should be aligned in the same direction." -- Dr Roopleen

item.title: Melody add a quote by Melika Dannese Lux
item.description: "A lot of things should have been, Zigmund, but they arenâ€™t. Are you going to be miserable about the things you cannot change, or do something about the things you can?" -- Melika Dannese Lux

item.title: Melody add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "Life was never intended to consist of a glut of luxury, be an easy course, or filled only with success. There are those games which we lose, those races in which we finish last, and those promotions which never come. Such experiences provide an opportunity for us to show our determination and to rise above disappointment." -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Melody add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Melody add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Not all those who wander are lost." -- J.R.R. Tolkien
